mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Expresses appreciation for invitation of June 17 to join the Volunteers of Petersburg in celebrating anniversary of National independence; regrets that the "hand of time" disables him from taking journey; the continued repetition of these commemorations through the ages to come will be themes of unceasing prayer with him.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1823 June 25, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia], to Messrs. William Pannill, John McRae, and John Pollard, n.p.
